title: Children of a Dead Earth
notes: Also fails to start with regular WINE. Tested the vcrun2013 fix suggested on the forums on both the WINE and the Proton prefix with no success. I had managed to make it work perfectly on WINE in Linux Mint around April with only vcrun2013.

title: Children of a Dead Earth
notes: Could not run from an NTFS partition, but migrating the game to ext4 worked. There is some minor sound distortion in the main menu but the performance is good.

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon R9 200 Series (HAWAII, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.8-1-default, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes: Game starts and is playable, but making any changes in the settings causes the game to freeze.
title: Children of a Dead Earth
